row.provenance: Gift of Florence Kricheff in loving memory of Alexander Kricheff
row.title: Bust of Frederick Douglass
row.additionalInfo: Bust of Frederick Douglass (1818-1895) \"portrayed as a young man at the height of his power from photographs taken at that time\".

row.provenance: Gift of Gary and Tracy Mezzatesta
row.title: Bramble Dance
row.additionalInfo: Red male figure (modeled after Saint Sebastian) attempting to remove bramble that has pierced various portions of his body.

row.provenance: Gift of The Ella Fitzgerald Charitable Foundation
row.title: Photographs of Performing Artists, 1973-1989 [Ella Fitzgerald]
row.additionalInfo: photograph of Ella Fitzgerald performing in a yellow satin dress; used by Pablo recordings.
